original: tad bhavatāsmākam abhyāgatānāṃ praṇayabhaṅgo na kāryaḥ /
analyzed: tat bhavatā asmākam abhyāgatānām praṇaya bhaṅgaḥ na kāryaḥ

original: ity uktaḥ puraṃjayaḥ prāha /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ puraṃjayaḥ prāha

original: sakalatrailokyanātho yo 'yaṃ yuṣmākam indraḥ śatakratur asya yady ahaṃ skandhārūḍho yuṣmadarātibhiḥ saha yotsye tadāhaṃ bhavatāṃ sahāyaḥ /
analyzed: sakala trailokya nāthaḥ yaḥ yam yuṣmākam indraḥ śatakratuḥ asya yadi aham skandha ārūḍhaḥ yuṣmad arātibhiḥ saha yotsye tadā aham bhavatām sahāyaḥ

original: ity ākarṇya samastadevair indreṇa ca bāḍham ity evaṃ samanvicchitam // ViP_4,2.17 //
analyzed: iti ākarṇya samasta devaiḥ indreṇa ca bāḍham iti evam samanvicchitam

original: tataś ca śatakrator vṛṣabharūpadhāriṇaḥ kakutstho 'tiharṣasamanvito bhagavataś carācaraguror acyutasya tejasāpyāyito devāsurasaṃgrāme samastān  #
analyzed: tatas ca śatakratoḥ vṛṣabha rūpa dhāriṇaḥ kakutsthaḥ u ti harṣa samanvitaḥ bhagavataḥ carācara guroḥ acyutasya tejasā āpyāyitaḥ deva asura saṃgrāme samastān

analyzed: jaghāna dhundhumāra saṃjñām ca avāpa

original: sa cāpi tatsparśopacīyamānaharṣaprakarṣo bahuprakāraṃ tasya ṛṣeḥ paśyatas tair ātmajapautradauhitrādibhiḥ sahānudinaṃ bahuprakāraṃ reme //

original: §saubharir uvāca:

analyzed: dadhyau

original: §saubharir uvāca:

original: §parāśara uvāca:

original: §parāśara uvāca:

analyzed: babhūvuḥ

original: §parāśara uvāca:

original: mama samāṃsaṃ bhojanaṃ deyaṃ tat saṃskriyatāṃ kṣaṇād ihāgamiṣyāmīty uktvā niṣkrāntaḥ // ViP_4,4.32 //

analyzed: āgatāya ca vasiṣṭhāya niveditavān

original: yasmād abhojyam etad asmadvidhānāṃ tapasvinām avagacchann api bhavān mahyaṃ dadāti tasmāt tavaivātra lolupā buddhir bhaviṣyatīti // ViP_4,4.35
analyzed: yasmāt abhojyam etat asmadvidhānām tapasvinām avagacchan api bhavān mahyam dadāti tasmāt tava eva atra lolupā buddhiḥ bhaviṣyati iti

original: prasāditaḥ /
analyzed: prasāditaḥ

original: sasyāmbudarakṣaṇārthaṃ tac chāpāmbu norvyāṃ na cākāśe cikṣepa tenaiva svapadau siṣeca // ViP_4,4.38 //

analyzed: tayoḥ ca tam ati bhīṣaṇam rākṣasam avalokya trāsāt pradhāvitayoḥ dampatyoḥ brāhmaṇam jagrāha

analyzed: prasīda ikṣvāku kula tilaka bhūtaḥ tvam mahā rāja mitrasahaḥ na rākṣasaḥ na arhasi strī dharma sukha abhijñaḥ

analyzed: niḥkṣatre kṣmā tale smin kriyamāṇe strībhiḥ vivastrābhiḥ parivārya rakṣitaḥ tatas tam nārīkavacam udāharanti

analyzed: āninye

analyzed: su nādaiḥ samasta bhūbhṛtām madhye sakala loka rakṣā artham yathocitam abhiṣiktaḥ dāśarathiḥ

analyzed: rājyam akarot

original: ye 'pi teṣu bhagavadaṃśeṣv anurāgiṇaḥ kosalanagarajanapadās te 'pi tanmanasas tatsalokatām avāpuḥ // ViP_4,4.57 //

analyzed: rāmasya tu kuśa lavau putrau lakṣmaṇasya aṅgada candraketū takṣa puṣkarau bharatasya subāhu śūrasenau śatrughnasya kuśasya atithiḥ atitheḥ api niṣadhaḥ  /

original: putro 'bhavat /
analyzed: putraḥ bhavat

original: niṣadhasyāpi nalas tasya api nabho nabhasaḥ puṇḍarīkaḥ /
analyzed: niṣadhasya api nalaḥ tasya api nabhaḥ nabhasaḥ puṇḍarīkaḥ

analyzed: tad tanayaḥ kṣemadhanvā tasya ca devānīkaḥ tasya api ahīnaguḥ tatas ruruḥ tasya ca pāriyātraḥ

analyzed: pāriyātrāt dalaḥ dalāt śalaḥ tasya api ukthaḥ ukthāt vajranābhaḥ tasmāt śaṅkhanābhaḥ

analyzed: tatas vyutthitāśvaḥ tatas ca viśvasahaḥ jajñe

analyzed: hiraṇyanābhaḥ tatas mahā yogi īśvaraḥ jaimini śiṣyaḥ yatas yājñavalkyaḥ yogam avāpa

original: tad ayam ānīyatām ity alam atiguṇavaty aparādhānveṣaneneti // ViP_4,13.43 //
analyzed: tat ayam ānīyatām iti alam ati guṇavati aparādha anveṣanena iti

original: yaduvṛddhasyāndhakasyaitad vacanam ākarṇya keśavograsenabalabhadrapurogamair yadubhiḥ kṛtāparādhatitikṣābhavam abhayaṃ dattvā śvāphalkiḥ svapuram  #
analyzed: yadu vṛddhasya andhakasya etat vacanam ākarṇya keśava ugrasena balabhadra purogamaiḥ yadubhiḥ kṛta aparādha titikṣā bhavam abhayam dattvā śvāphalkiḥ sva puram

original: ānītaḥ /
analyzed: ānītaḥ

original: tatra cāgatamātra eva tasya tatsthasya maṇer anubhāvad anāvṛṣṭimarakadurbhikṣavyālādyupadravaḥ śaśāma /
analyzed: tatra ca āgata mātraḥ eva tasya tad sthasya maṇeḥ anubhāvat anāvṛṣṭi maraka durbhikṣa vyāla ādi upadravaḥ śaśāma

original: kṛṣṇaś ca cintayām āsa /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ ca cintayām āsa

original: svalpam etat kāraṇaṃ yad ayaṃ gāndinyāṃ śvaphalkenākrūro jātaḥ /
analyzed: su alpam etat kāraṇam yat ayam gāndinyām śvaphalkena akrūraḥ jātaḥ

original: sumahāṃś cāyam anāvṛṣṭidurbhikṣamarakādyupadravaśamanakārī prabhāvaḥ // ViP_4,13.44 //
analyzed: su mahān ca ayam anāvṛṣṭi durbhikṣa maraka ādi upadrava śamana kārī prabhāvaḥ

original: tan nūnam asya sakāśe sa mahāmaṇiḥ syamantakākhyas tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: tat nūnam asya sakāśe sa mahā maṇiḥ syamantaka ākhyaḥ tiṣṭhati

original: tasya hy evaṃvidhāḥ prabhāvāḥ śrūyante /
analyzed: tasya hi evaṃvidhāḥ prabhāvāḥ śrūyante

original: ayam api ca yajñād anantaram anyat kratvantaraṃ anantaram ca tasmād yajñāntaraṃ yajatīti /
analyzed: ayam api ca yajñāt anantaram anyat kratu antaram anantaram ca tasmāt yajña antaram yajati iti

original: alpopādānaṃ cāsyā saṃśayam atrāsau varamaṇis tiṣṭhatīti kṛtādhyavasāyo 'nyat prayojanam uddiśya sakalayādavasamājam ātmageha evācīkarat //
analyzed: alpa upādānam saṃśayam atra asau vara maṇiḥ tiṣṭhati iti kṛta adhyavasāyaḥ prayojanam uddiśya sakala yādava samājam ātma gehe eva acīkarat

original: tatra copaviṣṭeṣv akhileṣu yādaveṣu pūrvaprayojanam upanyasya paryavasite ca tasmin prasaṅgāgataparihāsakathām akrūreṇa saha kṛtvā janārdanas  #
analyzed: tatra ca upaviṣṭeṣu akhileṣu yādaveṣu pūrva prayojanam upanyasya paryavasite ca tasmin prasaṅga āgata parihāsa kathām akrūreṇa saha kṛtvā janārdanaḥ

original: tam akrūram āha // ViP_4,13.46 //
analyzed: tam akrūram āha

original: dānapate jānīma eva vayaṃ yathā śatadhanvanā tad akhilajagatsārabhūtaṃ syamantakaratnaṃ bhavataḥ samarpitaṃ tad etad rāṣṭropakārakaṃ bhavataḥ  #
analyzed: dānapate jānīmaḥ eva vayam yathā śatadhanvanā tat akhila jagat sāra bhūtam syamantaka ratnam bhavataḥ samarpitam tat etat rāṣṭra upakārakam bhavataḥ

original: sakāśe tiṣṭhatīti /
analyzed: sakāśe tiṣṭhati iti

original: tiṣṭhatu sarva eva vayaṃ tatprabhāvaphalabhujaḥ kiṃ tv eṣa balabhadro 'smān āśaṅkitavāṃs tad asmatprītaye darśayety abhihitaḥ saratnaḥ so 'cintayat
analyzed: tiṣṭhatu sarve eva vayam tad prabhāva phala bhujaḥ kim tu eṣa balabhadraḥ smān āśaṅkitavān tat asmad prītaye darśaya iti abhihitaḥ sa ratnaḥ saḥ u cintayat

original: kim atrānuṣṭheyam anyathā ced bravīmy ahaṃ tat kevalāmbaratirodhānam anviṣyanto ratnam
analyzed: kim atra anuṣṭheyam anyathā ced bravīmi aham tat kevala ambara tirodhānam anviṣyantaḥ ratnam

original: etad drakṣyantīty anveṣaṇaṃ na kṣemam iti saṃcintya tam akhilajagatkāraṇabhūtaṃ nārāyaṇam āhākrūraḥ /
analyzed: etat drakṣyanti iti anveṣaṇam na kṣemam iti saṃcintya tam akhila jagat kāraṇa bhūtam nārāyaṇam āha akrūraḥ

original: bhagavan mamaitat syamantakaratnaṃ śatadhanvanā samarpitam // ViP_4,13.48 //
analyzed: bhagavat mama etat syamantaka ratnam śatadhanvanā samarpitam

original: apagate ca tasminn adya śvaḥ paraśvo vā bhagavān māṃ yācayiṣyatīti etāvantaṃ kālam atikṛcchreṇādhārayam /
analyzed: apagate ca tasmin adya śvas paraśvas vā bhagavān mām yācayiṣyati iti etāvantam kālam atikṛcchreṇa adhārayam

original: tasya ca dhāraṇakleśenāham aśeṣopabhogeṣv asaṅgimānaso na vedmi svasukhakalām api // ViP_4,13.49 //
analyzed: tasya ca dhāraṇa kleśena aham aśeṣa upabhogeṣu asaṅgi mānasaḥ na vedmi sva sukha kalām api

original: etāvanmātram apy aśeṣarāṣṭropakārī dhārayituṃ na śaknotīti māṃ bhavān maṃsyata ity ātmanā na coditam // ViP_4,13.50 //
analyzed: etāvat mātram api aśeṣa rāṣṭra upakārī dhārayitum na śaknoti iti mām bhavān maṃsyate iti ātmanā na ca uditam

original: tad idaṃ syamantakaratnaṃ gṛhyatām icchayā yasyābhimataṃ tasya samarpyatām /
analyzed: tat idam syamantaka ratnam gṛhyatām icchayā yasya abhimatam tasya samarpyatām

original: tataḥ so 'dharavastranigopitātilaghukanakasamudgakaṃ pragaṭīkṛtavān // ViP_4,13.51 //
analyzed: tatas saḥ dhara vastra nigopita ati laghu kanaka samudgakam pragaṭīkṛtavān

original: tataś ca niṣkrāmya syamantakamaṇiṃ tasmin yadusamāje mumoca /
analyzed: tatas ca niṣkrāmya syamantaka maṇim tasmin yadu samāje mumoca

original: muktamātre ca tenātikāntyā tad akhilam āsthānam uddyotitam // ViP_4,13.52 //
analyzed: mukta mātre ca tena ati kāntyā tat akhilam āsthānam uddyotitam

original: athāhākrūraḥ /
analyzed: atha āha akrūraḥ

original: sa eṣa maṇir yaḥ śatadhanvanāsmākaṃ samarpito yasyāyaṃ sa enaṃ gṛhṇātv iti /
analyzed: saḥ eṣa maṇiḥ yaḥ śatadhanvanā asmākam samarpitaḥ yasya ayam saḥ enam gṛhṇātu iti

original: tam ālokya sarvayādavānāṃ sādhu sādhv iti vismitavacasāṃ vāco 'śrūyanta /
analyzed: tam ālokya sarva yādavānām sādhu sādhu iti vismita vacasām vācaḥ śrūyanta

original: tam ālokyamamāyam acyutenaiva sāmānyaḥ samanvicchita iti balabhadraḥ saspṛho 'bhavat // ViP_4,13.53 //
analyzed: tam ālokya mamāyam acyutena eva sāmānyaḥ samanvicchitaḥ iti balabhadraḥ sa spṛhaḥ bhavat

original: mamedaṃ pitṛdhanam ity atīva ca satyabhāmā spṛhāṃ cakāra /
analyzed: mama idam pitṛ dhanam iti atīva ca satyabhāmā spṛhām cakāra

original: balabhadrasatyānanāvalokanāt kṛṣṇo 'py ātmānaṃ cakrāntarāvasthitam iva mene /
analyzed: balabhadra satya ānana avalokanāt kṛṣṇaḥ pi ātmānam cakra antara avasthitam iva mene

original: sakalayādavapratyakṣaṃ cākrūram āha /
analyzed: sakala yādava pratyakṣam ca akrūram āha

original: etad dhi maṇiratnam ātmasaṃśodhanāya eṣāṃ yadūnāṃ darśitam etac ca mama balabhadrasya ca sāmānyaṃ pitṛdhanaṃ caitat satyabhāmāyā nānyasya //
analyzed: etat hi maṇi ratnam ātma saṃśodhanāya eṣām yadūnām darśitam etat ca mama balabhadrasya ca sāmānyam pitṛ dhanam ca etat satyabhāmāyāḥ na anyasya

original: etat sarvakālaṃ śucinā brahmacaryeṇa dhriyamāṇam aśeṣarāṣṭrasyopakārakam aśucinā dhriyamāṇam ādhāram eva hanti // ViP_4,13.55 //
analyzed: etat sarvakālam śucinā brahmacaryeṇa dhriyamāṇam aśeṣa rāṣṭrasya upakārakam aśucinā dhriyamāṇam ādhāram eva hanti

original: ato 'ham asya ṣoḍaśastrīsahasraparigrahād asamartho dhāraṇe /
analyzed: atas ham asya ṣoḍaśa strī sahasra parigrahāt asamarthaḥ dhāraṇe

original: katham caitat satyabhāmā svīkarotu /
analyzed: katham ca etat satyabhāmā svīkarotu

original: āryabalabhadreṇāpi madirāpānādyaśeṣopabhogaparityāgaḥ kathaṃ kāryaḥ /
analyzed: ārya balabhadreṇa api madirā pāna ādi aśeṣa upabhoga parityāgaḥ katham kāryaḥ

original: tad ayaṃ yaduloko 'haṃ balabhadraḥ satyā ca tvāṃ dānapate prārthayāmaḥ /
analyzed: tat ayam yadu lokaḥ ham balabhadraḥ satyā ca tvām dānapate prārthayāmaḥ

original: etad bhavān eva dhārayituṃ samarthaḥ /
analyzed: etat bhavān eva dhārayitum samarthaḥ

original: tvadsthaṃ cāsya rāṣṭrasyopakārakaṃ tad bhavān aśeṣarāṣṭropakāranimittam etat pūrvavad dhārayatu /
analyzed: tvad stham ca asya rāṣṭrasya upakārakam tat bhavān aśeṣa rāṣṭra upakāra nimittam etat pūrvavat dhārayatu

original: tataḥ prabhṛti ca akrūraḥ prakaṭenaivātitejasā jājjvalyamānenātmakaṇṭhāsaktenāditya ivāṃśumālī cacāra // ViP_4,13.56 //
analyzed: tatas prabhṛti ca akrūraḥ prakaṭena eva ati tejasā jājjvalyamānena ātma kaṇṭha āsaktena ādityaḥ iva aṃśumālī cacāra

analyzed: avyāhata indriyaḥ ca akhila pāpa mokṣam avāpnoti iti

analyzed: iti śrī viṣṇupurāṇe caturthe ṃśe trayodaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: §parāśara uvāca:
analyzed: parāśaraḥ uvāca

analyzed: anamitrasya sutaḥ śiniḥ nāma abhavat

analyzed: tasya api satyakaḥ satyakāt sātyakiḥ yuyudhāna nāmā

analyzed: tasmāt api asaṅgaḥ tad putraḥ ca tūṇiḥ tūṇeḥ yugaṃdharaḥ

analyzed: iti śaineyāḥ

analyzed: anamitrasya eva anvaye vṛṣṇiḥ

analyzed: tasmāt ca śvaphalkaḥ tad prabhāvaḥ kathitaḥ eva

analyzed: śvaphalkasya kanīyān citrakaḥ nāma abhavat bhrātā

analyzed: śvaphalkāt akrūraḥ gāndinyām abhavat

analyzed: tathā upamadguḥ upamadgoḥ putrāḥ sutāra ākhyā

original: ca kanyā /
analyzed: ca kanyā

analyzed: devavān upadevaḥ ca akrūra putrau

analyzed: pṛthu vipṛthu pramukhāḥ citrakasya putrāḥ bahavaḥ bhavan

analyzed: kukura bhajamāna śuci kambalabarhiṣa ākhyāḥ tathā andhakasya catvāraḥ putrāḥ

analyzed: kukurāt dhṛṣṭaḥ tasmāt ca kapotaromā tatas ca vilomā

analyzed: tasmāt api tumburusakhāḥ bhava saṃjñaḥ candana udakadundubhiḥ

original: tataś cābhijit tataḥ punarvasuḥ /
analyzed: tatas ca abhijit tatas punarvasuḥ

analyzed: tasya api āhukaḥ putraḥ āhukī ca kanyā

analyzed: āhukasya devaka ugrasenau dvau putrau

original: teṣāṃ ca vṛkadevopadevā devarakṣitā śrīdevā śāntidevā sahadevā devakī ca sapta bhaginyaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām ca vṛkadevā upadevāḥ devarakṣitā śrīdevā śāntidevā sahadevā devakī ca sapta bhaginyaḥ

original: tāś ca sarvā eva vasudeva upayeme /
analyzed: tāḥ ca sarvāḥ eva vasudevaḥ upayeme

original: ugrasenasyāpi kaṃsanyagrodhasunāmakaṅkaśaṅkusubhūmirāṣṭrapālayuddhamuṣṭituṣṭimatsaṃjñāḥ putrāḥ /
analyzed: ugrasenasya api kaṃsa nyagrodha sunāma kaṅka śaṅku subhūmi rāṣṭrapāla yuddhamuṣṭi tuṣṭimat saṃjñāḥ putrāḥ

original: kaṃsā kaṃsavatī sutanū rāṣṭrapālī kaṅkī ca ugrasenatanūjāḥ /
analyzed: kaṃsā kaṃsavatī sutanuḥ rāṣṭrapālī kaṅkī ca ugrasena tanūjāḥ

original: bhajamānāc ca vidūrathaḥ putro 'bhavat /
analyzed: bhajamānāt ca vidūrathaḥ putraḥ bhavat

original: vidūrathāc chūraḥ śūrāc chamī śaminaḥ pratikṣatraḥ /
analyzed: vidūrathāt śūraḥ śūrāt śamī śaminaḥ pratikṣatraḥ

original: tasmāt svayaṃbhojas tataś ca hṛdikaḥ // ViP_4,14.5 //
analyzed: tasmāt svayaṃbhojaḥ tatas ca hṛdikaḥ

original: tasyāpi kṛtavarmaśatadhanurdevamīḍhuṣākhyāḥ putrā babhūvuḥ // ViP_4,14.6 //

original: devamīḍhuṣasya śūrasya māriṣā nāma patny abhavat // ViP_4,14.7 //
analyzed: devamīḍhuṣasya śūrasya māriṣā nāma patnī abhavat

original: tasyāṃ cāsau daśa putrān ajanayad vasudevapūrvān /
analyzed: tasyām ca asau daśa putrān ajanayat vasudeva pūrvān

original: vasudevasya jātamātrasyaiva tadgṛhe bhagavadaṃśāvatāram avyāhatadṛṣṭyā paśyadbhir devair divyānakadundubhayaś ca vāditāḥ /
analyzed: vasudevasya jāta mātrasya eva tad gṛhe bhagavat aṃśa avatāram avyāhata dṛṣṭyā paśyadbhiḥ devaiḥ divya ānakadundubhayaḥ ca vāditāḥ

original: tatas tadaivānakadundubhisaṃjñām avāpa /
analyzed: tatas tadā evā ānakadundubhi saṃjñām avāpa

original: tasyāpi devabhāgadevaśravānādhṛṣṭikarundhakavatsabālakasṛñjayaśyāmaśamīkagaṇḍūṣasaṃjñā nava bhrātaro babhūvuḥ /
analyzed: tasya api devabhāga deva śravān ādhṛṣṭika rundhaka vatsa bālaka sṛñjaya śyāma śamīka gaṇḍūṣa saṃjñāḥ nava bhrātaraḥ babhūvuḥ

original: pṛthā śrutadevā śrutakīrtiḥ śrutaśravā rājādhidevī ca vasudevādīnāṃ pañca bhaginyo 'bhavan // ViP_4,14.8 //
analyzed: pṛthā śrutadevā śrutakīrtiḥ śrutaśravāḥ rājādhidevī ca vasudeva ādīnām pañca bhaginyaḥ bhavan

original: śūrasya kuntir nāma sakhābhavat /
analyzed: śūrasya kuntiḥ nāma sakhā bhavat

original: tasmai cāputrāya pṛthām ātmajāṃ vidhinā śūro dattavān /
analyzed: tasmai ca aputrāya pṛthām ātmajām vidhinā śūraḥ dattavān

original: tāṃ ca pāṇḍur uvāha /
analyzed: tām ca pāṇḍuḥ uvāha

original: tasyāṃ ca dharmānilaśakrair yudhiṣṭhirabhīmārjunākhyās trayaḥ putrāḥ samutpāditāḥ /
analyzed: tasyām ca dharma anila śakraiḥ yudhiṣṭhira bhīma arjuna ākhyāḥ trayaḥ putrāḥ samutpāditāḥ

original: pūrvam anūḍhāyāś ca bhagavatā bhāsvatā kānīnaḥ karṇo nāma putro 'janyata // ViP_4,14.9 //
analyzed: pūrvam anūḍhāyāḥ ca bhagavatā bhāsvatā kānīnaḥ karṇaḥ nāma putraḥ janyata

original: tasyāś ca sapatnī mādrī nāmābhavat /
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca sapatnī mādrī nāma abhavat

original: nāsatyadasrābhyāṃ tasyām api nakulasahadevau pāṇḍoḥ putrau janitau /
analyzed: nāsatya dasrābhyām tasyām api nakula sahadevau pāṇḍoḥ putrau janitau

original: śrutadevāṃ tu vṛddhaśarmā nāma kārūśa upayeme /
analyzed: śrutadevām tu vṛddhaśarmā nāma kārūśaḥ upayeme

original: tasyāṃ dantavakro nāma mahāsuro jajñe /
analyzed: tasyām dantavakraḥ nāma mahā asuraḥ jajñe

original: śrutakīrtim api kaikeyarāja upayeme /
analyzed: śrutakīrtim api kaikeya rājaḥ upayeme

original: tasyāṃ saṃtardanādayaḥ kaikeyāḥ pañca putrā babhūvuḥ /
analyzed: tasyām saṃtardana ādayaḥ kaikeyāḥ pañca putrāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: rājādhidevyām āvantyau vindānuvindau jajñāte /
analyzed: rājādhidevyām āvantyau vinda anuvindau jajñāte

original: śrutaśravasam api cedirājo damaghoṣanāmopayeme /
analyzed: śrutaśravasam api cedi rājaḥ damaghoṣa nāmā upayeme

original: tasyāṃ śiśupālam utpādayām āsa /
analyzed: tasyām śiśupālam utpādayām āsa

original: sa hi pūrvam apy anācāravikramasaṃpanno daityānām ādipuruṣo hiraṇyakaśipur abhūt // ViP_4,14.10 //
analyzed: sa hi pūrvam api anācāra vikrama saṃpannaḥ daityānām ādi puruṣaḥ hiraṇyakaśipuḥ abhūt

original: ity ete bārhadrathā bhūpatayo varṣasahasram ekaṃ bhaviṣyantīti // ViP_4,23.2 //
analyzed: iti ete bārhadrathāḥ bhūpatayaḥ varṣa sahasram ekam bhaviṣyanti iti

original: [[iti śrīviṣṇupurāṇe caturthe 'ṃśe trayoviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ ]]
analyzed: iti śrī viṣṇupurāṇe caturthe ṃśe trayoviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: §parāśara uvāca:
analyzed: parāśaraḥ uvāca

original: yo 'yaṃ ripuṃjayo nāma bārhadratho 'ntyas tasya muniko nāmāmātyo bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: yaḥ yam ripuṃjayaḥ nāma bārhadrathaḥ tasya munikaḥ nāma amātyaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: sa cainaṃ svāminaṃ hatvā svaputraṃ pradyotanāmānam abhiṣekṣyati /
analyzed: sa ca enam svāminam hatvā sva putram pradyota nāmānam abhiṣekṣyati

original: tasyāpi pālako nāma putro bhavitā /
analyzed: tasya api pālakaḥ nāma putraḥ bhavitā

original: tataś ca viśākhayūpas tatputro janakas tasya ca nandivardhanaḥ /
analyzed: tatas ca viśākhayūpaḥ tad putraḥ janakaḥ tasya ca nandivardhanaḥ

original: ity ete 'ṣṭatriṃśaduttaram abdaśataṃ pañca pradyotāḥ pṛthivīṃ bhokṣyanti // ViP_4,24.1 //
analyzed: iti ete ṣṭatriṃśat uttaram abda śatam pañca pradyotāḥ pṛthivīm bhokṣyanti

original: tataś ca śiśunāgas tatputraś ca kākavarṇo bhavitā /
analyzed: tatas ca śiśunāgaḥ tad putraḥ ca kākavarṇaḥ bhavitā

original: tatputraḥ kṣemadharmā tasyāpi kṣatraujāḥ /
analyzed: tad putraḥ kṣemadharmā tasya api kṣatraujāḥ

original: tatputro vidhisāras tataś cājātaśatruḥ /
analyzed: tad putraḥ vidhisāraḥ tatas ca ajātaśatruḥ

original: tasmāc ca darbhako darbhakāc codayanaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt ca darbhakaḥ darbhakāt ca udayanaḥ

original: tasmād api nandivardhanas tato mahānandī /
analyzed: tasmāt api nandivardhanaḥ tatas mahānandī

original: ity ete śaiśunāgā daśa bhūmipālās trīṇi varṣaśatāni dviṣaṣṭyadhikāni bhaviṣyanti // ViP_4,24.2 //
analyzed: iti ete śaiśunāgāḥ daśa bhūmipālāḥ trīṇi varṣa śatāni dviṣaṣṭi adhikāni bhaviṣyanti

original: mahānandisutaḥ śūdrāgarbhodbhavo 'tilubdho mahāpadmo nandaḥ paraśurāma ivāparo 'khilakṣatrāntakārī bhavitā // ViP_4,24.3 //
analyzed: mahānandi sutaḥ ti lubdhaḥ mahāpadmaḥ nandaḥ paraśurāmaḥ iva aparaḥ khila kṣatra anta kārī bhavitā

original: tataḥprabhṛti śūdrā bhūmipālā bhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: tatas prabhṛti śūdrāḥ bhūmipālāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: sa caikacchatrām anullaṅghitaśāsano mahāpadmaḥ pṛthivīṃ bhokṣyati // ViP_4,24.4 //
analyzed: sa ca eka chatrām an ullaṅghita śāsanaḥ mahāpadmaḥ pṛthivīm bhokṣyati

original: tasyāpy aṣṭau sutāḥ sumālyādyā bhavitāraḥ /
analyzed: tasya api aṣṭau sutāḥ sumālya ādyāḥ bhavitāraḥ

original: tasya ca mahāpadmasyānu pṛthivīṃ bhokṣyanti /
analyzed: tasya ca mahāpadmasya anu pṛthivīm bhokṣyanti

original: mahāpadmas tatputrāś ca ekaṃ varṣaśatam avanīpatayo bhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: mahāpadmaḥ tad putrāḥ ca ekam varṣa śatam avanīpatayaḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: navaitān nandān kauṭilyo brāhmaṇaḥ samuddhariṣyati // ViP_4,24.5 //
analyzed: nava etān nandān kauṭilyaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ samuddhariṣyati

original: teṣām abhāve mauryāḥ pṛthivīṃ bhokṣyanti /
analyzed: teṣām abhāve mauryāḥ pṛthivīm bhokṣyanti

original: kauṭilya eva candraguptaṃ rājye 'bhiṣekṣyati // ViP_4,24.6 //
analyzed: kauṭilyaḥ eva candraguptam rājye bhiṣekṣyati

original: tasyāpi putro bindusāro bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: tasya api putraḥ bindusāraḥ bhaviṣyati

original: tasyāpy aśokavardhanas tataḥ suyaśās tato daśarathas tataḥ saṃgatas tataḥ śāliśūkas tasmāt somaśarmā tasmāc chatadhanvā /
analyzed: tasya api aśokavardhanaḥ tatas suyaśāḥ tatas daśarathaḥ tatas saṃgataḥ tatas śāliśūkaḥ tasmāt somaśarmā tasmāt śatadhanvā

original: tasyāpy'nu bṛhadrathanāmā bhavitā /
analyzed: tasya api nu bṛhadratha nāmā bhavitā

original: evaṃ mauryā daśa bhūpatayo bhaviṣyanti abdaśataṃ saptatriṃśaduttaram /
analyzed: evam mauryāḥ daśa bhūpatayaḥ bhaviṣyanti abda śatam saptatriṃśat uttaram

original: teṣām ante pṛthivīṃ śuṅgā bhokṣyanti // ViP_4,24.7 //
analyzed: teṣām ante pṛthivīm śuṅgāḥ bhokṣyanti

original: puṣyamitraḥ senāpatiḥ svāminaṃ hatvā rājyaṃ kariṣyati // ViP_4,24.8 //
analyzed: puṣyamitraḥ senāpatiḥ svāminam hatvā rājyam kariṣyati

original: asyātmajo 'gnimitras tasmāt sujyeṣṭhas tato vasumitras tasmād apy ardrakas tataḥ pulindakas tato ghoṣavasus tasmād api vajramitras tato bhāgavataḥ
analyzed: asya ātmajaḥ gnimitraḥ tasmāt sujyeṣṭhaḥ tatas vasumitraḥ tasmāt api ardrakaḥ tatas pulindakaḥ tatas ghoṣavasuḥ tasmāt api vajramitraḥ tatas bhāgavataḥ

original: tasmād devabhūtiḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt devabhūtiḥ

original: ity ete daśa śuṅgā dvādaśottaraṃ varṣaśataṃ pṛthivīṃ bhokṣyanti /
analyzed: iti ete daśa śuṅgāḥ dvādaśa uttaram varṣa śatam pṛthivīm bhokṣyanti

original: tataḥ kaṇvān eṣā bhūr yāsyati // ViP_4,24.10 //
analyzed: tatas kaṇvān eṣā bhūḥ yāsyati

original: devabhūtiṃ tu śuṅgarājānaṃ vyasaninaṃ tasyaivāmātyaḥ kaṇvo vasudevanāmā nipātya svayam avanīṃ bhokṣyate /
analyzed: devabhūtim tu śuṅga rājānam vyasaninam tasya eva amātyaḥ kaṇvaḥ vasudeva nāmā nipātya svayam avanīm bhokṣyate

original: tasya putro bhūmitras tasyāpi nārāyaṇaḥ /
analyzed: tasya putraḥ bhūmitraḥ tasya api nārāyaṇaḥ

original: nārāyaṇasyātmajaḥ suśarmā /
analyzed: nārāyaṇasya ātmajaḥ suśarmā

original: ete kāṇvāyanāś catvāraḥ pañcacatvāriṃśad varṣāṇi bhūpatayo bhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: ete kāṇvāyanāḥ catvāraḥ pañcacatvāriṃśat varṣāṇi bhūpatayaḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: suśarmāṇaṃ tu kāṇvaṃ svabhṛtyo balāt śiprakanāmā hatvāndhrajātīyo vasudhāṃ bhokṣyati /
analyzed: suśarmāṇam tu kāṇvam sva bhṛtyaḥ balāt śipraka nāmā hatvā andhra jātīyaḥ vasudhām bhokṣyati

original: tataś ca kṛṣṇanāmā tadbhrātā bhūpatir bhāvī /
analyzed: tatas ca kṛṣṇa nāmā tad bhrātā bhūpatiḥ bhāvī

original: tasya putraḥ śrīśātakarṇis tasyāpi pūrṇotsaṅgas tatputraś ca śātakarṇis tasmāc ca lambodaras tasmād divīlakas tato meghasvātis tataḥ paṭumān
analyzed: tasya putraḥ śrīśātakarṇiḥ tasya api pūrṇotsaṅgaḥ tad putraḥ ca śātakarṇiḥ tasmāt ca lambodaraḥ tasmāt divīlakaḥ tatas meghasvātiḥ tatas paṭumān

original: tataś cāriṣṭakarmā tato hālo hālāt pattalakas tataḥ pravilla senas tataḥ sundaraḥ śātakarṇī tasmāc cakoraḥ śātakarṇī tataḥ śivasvātis tataś  #
analyzed: tatas ca ariṣṭakarmā tatas hālaḥ hālāt pattalakaḥ tatas pravilla senaḥ tatas sundaraḥ śātakarṇī tasmāt cakoraḥ śātakarṇī tatas śivasvātiḥ tatas

original: ca gomatīputras tatputraḥ pulimān /
analyzed: ca gomatīputraḥ tad putraḥ pulimān

original: tasyāpi śātakarṇī tataḥ śivaśrīs tataḥ śivaskandhaḥ /
analyzed: tasya api śātakarṇī tatas śiva śrīḥ tatas śiva skandhaḥ

original: tasmād yajñaśrīs tato vijayas tataś candraśrīs tasyāpi pulomāviḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt yajña śrīḥ tatas vijayaḥ tatas candra śrīḥ tasya api pulomā aviḥ

original: evam ete triṃśac catvāry abdaśatāni ṣaṭpañcāśadadhikāni pṛthivīṃ bhokṣyanty āndhrabhṛtyāḥ // ViP_4,24.11 //
analyzed: evam ete triṃśat catvāri abda śatāni ṣaṭpañcāśat adhikāni pṛthivīm bhokṣyanti āndhra bhṛtyāḥ

original: saptābhīrāḥ daśa gardabhilāś ca bhūbhujo bhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: sapta ābhīrāḥ daśa gardabhilāḥ ca bhūbhujaḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: tataḥ ṣoḍaśa śakā bhūpatayo bhavitāraḥ /
analyzed: tatas ṣoḍaśa śakāḥ bhūpatayaḥ bhavitāraḥ

original: tataś cāṣṭau yavanāś caturdaśa tuṣārā muṇḍāś ca trayodaśa ekādaśa maunāḥ /
analyzed: tatas ca aṣṭau yavanāḥ caturdaśa tuṣārāḥ muṇḍāḥ ca trayodaśa ekādaśa maunāḥ

original: ete pṛthivīṃ trayodaśavarṣaśatāni navanavatyadhikāni bhokṣyanti // ViP_4,24.12 //
analyzed: ete pṛthivīm trayodaśa varṣa śatāni nava navati adhikāni bhokṣyanti

original: tataś ca paurā ekādaśa bhūpatayo 'bdaśatāni trīṇi mahīṃ bhokṣyanti /
analyzed: tatas ca paurāḥ ekādaśa bhūpatayaḥ bda śatāni trīṇi mahīm bhokṣyanti

original: teṣūtsanneṣu kailakilā yavanā bhūpatayo bhaviṣyanty amūrdhābhiṣiktāḥ /
analyzed: teṣu utsanneṣu kailakilāḥ yavanāḥ bhūpatayaḥ bhaviṣyanti a mūrdha abhiṣiktāḥ

original: teṣāṃ vindhyaśaktiḥ // ViP_4,24.13 //
analyzed: teṣām vindhya śaktiḥ

original: tataḥ puraṃjayas tato rāmacandras tasmād dharmo dharmād vaṅgaraḥ kṛtanandanaḥ suṣinandis tadbhrātā nandiyaśāḥ śiśukapravīrau caite varṣaśataṃ  #
analyzed: tatas puraṃjayaḥ tatas rāmacandraḥ tasmāt dharmaḥ dharmāt vaṅgaraḥ kṛtanandanaḥ suṣinandiḥ tad bhrātā nandiyaśāḥ śiśuka pravīrau ca ete varṣa śatam

original: ṣaḍ varṣāṇi ca bhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: ṣaḍ varṣāṇi ca bhaviṣyanti

original: tatas tatputrās trayodaśaite bāhlikāś ca trayaḥ /
analyzed: tatas tad putrāḥ trayodaśā ete bāhlikāḥ ca trayaḥ

original: tataḥ puṣyamitrapaṭumitrās trayodaśa mekalāś ca saptāndhrāḥ /
analyzed: tatas puṣyamitra paṭumitrāḥ trayodaśa mekalāḥ ca sapta andhrāḥ

original: kosalāyāṃ tu navaiva bhūpatayo bhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: kosalāyām tu navā eva bhūpatayaḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: naiṣadhās tu tāvanta eva // ViP_4,24.14 //
analyzed: naiṣadhāḥ tu tāvantaḥ eva

original: māgadhāyāṃ tu viśvasphaṭikasaṃjño 'nyān varṇān kariṣyati /
analyzed: māgadhāyām tu viśvasphaṭika saṃjñaḥ nyān varṇān kariṣyati

original: kaivartapaṭupulindabrāhmaṇān rājye sthāpayiṣyati /
analyzed: kaivarta paṭu pulinda brāhmaṇān rājye sthāpayiṣyati

original: utsādyākhilakṣatrajātim /
analyzed: utsādya akhila kṣatra jātim

analyzed: nava nāgāḥ padmāvatyām nāma puryām mathurāyām anu gaṅgā prayāgam māgadhāḥ guptāḥ ca bhokṣyanti

original: kośalauḍrapuṇḍratāmraliptān samudrataṭapurīṃ ca devarakṣito rakṣiṣyati /
analyzed: kośala oḍra puṇḍra tāmraliptān samudra taṭa purīm ca devarakṣitaḥ rakṣiṣyati

original: kaliṅgamāhiṣakamāhendrā bhaumāṃ guhāṃ bhokṣyanti /
analyzed: kaliṅga māhiṣaka māhendrāḥ bhaumām guhām bhokṣyanti

original: naiṣadhanaimiṣikakālatoyān janapadān maṇidhānakavaṃśyā bhokṣyanti /
analyzed: naiṣadha naimiṣika kālatoyān janapadān maṇidhānaka vaṃśyāḥ bhokṣyanti

original: trairājyamūṣikajanapadān kanakāhvayā bhokṣyanti /
analyzed: trairājya mūṣika janapadān kanakāhvayāḥ bhokṣyanti

original: saurāṣṭrāvantiśūdrān arbudamarubhūmiviṣayāṃś ca vrātyā dvijābhīraśūdrādyā bhokṣyanti /
analyzed: saurāṣṭra āvanti śūdrān arbuda maru bhūmi viṣayān ca vrātyāḥ dvija ābhīra śūdra ādyāḥ bhokṣyanti

original: sindhutaṭadāvikorvīcandrabhāgākāśmīraviṣayāṃś ca vrātyā mlecchādayaḥ śūdrā bhokṣyanti /
analyzed: sindhu taṭa dāvika urvī candrabhāgā kāśmīra viṣayān ca vrātyāḥ mleccha ādayaḥ śūdrāḥ bhokṣyanti

original: ete ca tulyakālāḥ sarve pṛthivyāṃ bhūbhṛto bhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: ete ca tulya kālāḥ sarve pṛthivyām bhūbhṛtaḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: alpaprasādā bṛhatkopāḥ sarvakālam anṛtādharmarucayaḥ strībālagovadhakartāraḥ parasvādānarucayo
analyzed: alpa prasādāḥ bṛhat kopāḥ sarvakālam anṛta adharma rucayaḥ strī bāla go vadha kartāraḥ para sva ādāna rucayaḥ

original: 'lpasārā uditāstamitaprāyāḥ svalpāyuṣo mahecchā hy alpadharmāś ca bhaviṣyanti // ViP_4,24.15 //
analyzed: lpa sārāḥ udita astamita prāyāḥ su alpa āyuṣaḥ mahā icchāḥ hi alpa dharmāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti

original: taiś ca vimiśrā janapadās tacchīlavartino rājāśrayaśuṣmiṇo mlecchācāryāś ca viparyayeṇa vartamānāḥ prajāḥ kṣapayiṣyanti /
analyzed: taiḥ ca vimiśrāḥ janapadāḥ tad śīla vartinaḥ rāja āśraya śuṣmiṇaḥ mleccha ācāryāḥ ca viparyayeṇa vartamānāḥ prajāḥ kṣapayiṣyanti

original: tataś cānudinam alpālpahrāsavyavacchedād dharmārthayor jagataḥ saṃkṣayo bhaviṣyati // ViP_4,24.16 //
analyzed: tatas ca anudinam alpa alpa hrāsa vyavacchedāt dharma arthayoḥ jagataḥ saṃkṣayaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: tataś cārtha evābhijanahetuḥ /
analyzed: tatas ca arthaḥ eva abhijana hetuḥ

original: dhanam evāśeṣadharmahetuḥ /
analyzed: dhanam eva aśeṣa dharma hetuḥ

original: abhirucir eva dāmpatyasaṃbandhahetuḥ /
analyzed: abhiruciḥ eva dāmpatya saṃbandha hetuḥ

original: strītvam evopabhogahetuḥ /
analyzed: strī tvam eva upabhoga hetuḥ

original: anṛtam eva vyavahārajayahetuḥ /
analyzed: anṛtam eva vyavahāra jaya hetuḥ

original: ratnatāmrabhāgitaiva pṛthivīhetuḥ /
analyzed: ratna tāmra bhāgitā eva pṛthivī hetuḥ

original: brahmasūtram eva vipratvahetuḥ /
analyzed: brahmasūtram eva vipra tva hetuḥ

original: liṅgadhāraṇam evāśramahetuḥ /
analyzed: liṅga dhāraṇam eva āśrama hetuḥ

original: anyāya eva vṛttihetuḥ // ViP_4,24.17 //
analyzed: anyāyaḥ eva vṛtti hetuḥ

original: daurbalyam evāvṛttihetuḥ /
analyzed: daurbalyam eva avṛtti hetuḥ

original: bhayagarbhoccāraṇam eva pāṇḍityahetuḥ /
analyzed: bhaya garbha uccāraṇam eva pāṇḍitya hetuḥ

original: āḍhyataiva sādhutvahetuḥ // ViP_4,24.18 //
analyzed: āḍhya tā eva sādhu tva hetuḥ

original: snānam eva prasādhanahetuḥ /
analyzed: snānam eva prasādhana hetuḥ

original: dānam eva dharmahetuḥ /
analyzed: dānam eva dharma hetuḥ

original: svīkaraṇam eva vivāhahetuḥ /
analyzed: svīkaraṇam eva vivāha hetuḥ

original: sadveśadhāry eva pātram /
analyzed: sat veśa dhāri eva pātram

original: dūrāyatanodakam eva tīrtham /
analyzed: dūra āyatana udakam eva tīrtham

original: ity evam anekadoṣottare bhūmaṇḍale sarvavarṇeṣv eva yo yo balavān sa sa bhūpatir bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: iti evam aneka doṣa uttare bhū maṇḍale sarva varṇeṣu eva yaḥ yaḥ balavān sa sa bhūpatiḥ bhaviṣyati

original: evaṃ cātilubdhakarabhārāsahāḥ śailānām antaradroṇīḥ prajāḥ saṃśrayiṣyanti /
analyzed: evam ca ati lubdha kara bhāra asahāḥ śailānām antara droṇīḥ prajāḥ saṃśrayiṣyanti

original: madhuśākamūlaphalapattrapuṣpādyāhārāś ca bhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: madhu śāka mūla phala pattra puṣpa ādi āhārāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti

original: taruvalkalacīraprāvaraṇāś cātibahuprajāḥ śītavātātapavarṣasahā bhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: taru valkala cīra prāvaraṇāḥ ca ati bahu prajāḥ śīta vāta ātapa varṣa sahāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: na ca kaścit trayoviṃśativarṣāṇi jīviṣyati anavarataṃ cātra kaliyuge kṣayam āyāty akhila evaiṣa janaḥ kṣayam upaiṣyati // ViP_4,24.19 //
analyzed: na ca kaścid trayoviṃśati varṣāṇi jīviṣyati anavaratam ca atra kali yuge kṣayam āyāti akhilaḥ evā eṣa janaḥ kṣayam upaiṣyati

original: śrautasmārtadharme viplavam atyantam upagate kṣīṇaprāye ca kalāv aśeṣajagatsraṣṭuś
analyzed: śrauta smārta dharme viplavam atyantam upagate kṣīṇa prāye ca kalau aśeṣa jagat sraṣṭuḥ

original: carācaraguror ādimayasyāntamayasya sarvamayasya brahmamayasyātmarūpiṇo bhagavato
analyzed: carācara guroḥ ādi mayasya anta mayasya sarva mayasya brahma mayasya ātma rūpiṇaḥ bhagavataḥ
